author: Brett Williams
description: The Facebook family is finally all together.
title: Facebook's new notifications bundle Instagram and Messenger together

author: Kerry Flynn
title: Facebook vs. the internet cesspool: The ugly fight of our ugly times

author: Kurt Wagner
description: The new partnership is Facebook’s biggest foray yet into live sports.
title: Facebook will stream 20 MLB games for free this season

author: BBC News
description: The "inconsistent" rules used to judge and censor content on Facebook are exposed, claim insiders.
title: Leaks 'expose peculiar Facebook moderation policy'

author: Rani Molla and Kurt Wagner
description: It didn’t happen fast, but Facebook’s business has taken off.
title: Facebook’s meteoric five-year climb as a public company in five charts

author: Denis Campbell
description: Poll of 14- to 24-year-olds shows Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat and Twitter increased feelings of inadequacy and anxiety
title: Facebook and Twitter 'harm young people's mental health'

author: John Shinal
description: The fines EU regulators have levied on Facebook this month are worth about four days profit -- or 4 cents a share
title: Facebook bulls need to watch out for European regulators

author: Welt Redaktion
description: Facebook überprüft Millionen Beschwerden pro Woche und löscht im Zweifel die Beiträge. Die Grundlage dafür ist teils fragwürdig, wie nun ein Bericht enthüllt.
title: So absurd löscht Facebook

author: Max Biederbeck
description: Facebooks Lösch-Praxis kommt per Leak an die Öffentlichkeit. Warum veröffentlicht das Unternehmen sie nicht selbst? Ein Kommentar.
title: Liebes Facebook, Transparenz ist nicht dein Feind

author: Allum Bokhari
description: Facebook's CEO boasts about his commitment to free speech. But the company regularly caves in to the demands of authoritarian regimes.
title: 5 Authoritarian Regimes That Shape Facebook's Censorship Policies - Breitbart
